mapper.select: select r.hadread_num, e.e_book_title, r.HADREAD_DATE from HADREAD as r join E_BOOK as e on r.E_BOOK_NUM = e.E_BOOK_NUM join MEMBER as m on r.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM where m.MEMBER_NUM = #{member_num};

select f.favorite_num, e.e_book_title, f.favorite_date from FAVORITE as f join E_BOOK as e on f.e_book_num = e.e_book_num join MEMBER as m on f.member_num = m.member_num where m.member_num = #{member_num};

select t.thumbup_num, e.e_book_title, t.thumbup_date from THUMBUP as t join E_BOOK as e on t.e_book_num = e.e_book_num join MEMBER as m on t.member_num = m.member_num where m.member_num = #{member_num};
select s.subscribe_num, s.subscribe_date, s.subscribe_fee from SUBSCRIBE as s join MEMBER as m on s.member_num = m.member_num where m.member_num = #{member_num};
mapper.update: update MEMBER set MEMBER_GRADE = 2 where MEMBER_NUM = #{member_num};
mapper.insert: insert into SUBSCRIBE values( (select max(s.SUBSCRIBE_NUM)+1 from SUBSCRIBE s), #{member_num}, now(), 10000);
mapper.update: update MEMBER set MEMBER_GRADE = 1 where MEMBER_NUM = #{member_num};
